title: Colorado View! W/D in Home! Hardwood Floors!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 774 Sq.
TRIO is located in the heart of Pasadena.
Not only will you be living in luxury but you will be shopping and dining in luxury too!
Countless shops & restaurants line the streets outside your door and you will be within walking distance from Old Town and South Lake Avenue.
TRIO Apartments brings you a taste of New Urbanism and is designed with respect for Pasadena's past, present and future.
The city's first parking garage has been converted into a charming and historical 5 story community on Colorado Boulevard.
Stop by today and allow TRIO to sweep you away!

Radius Corners & 9 foot Ceilings, Flat Panel or Barn Doors with Lever Hardware, Multiple Phone & Cable Lines, Designer Paint & Lighting, High Speed Internet Access Available, Huge Private Patio or Balcony, Full Size Washer & Dryer*, Walk In Closet or Mirrored Wardrobe with Single & Double Poled Organizers, Faux Brick Walls*, Central AC & Heating, Frost Free Refrigerator, Bar Height Breakfast Counter & Kitchen Pantry, Mezzanine*, Hourglass Shaped Bathtubs*, Stainless Appliances Including Gas Ranges

Conference Room & Business Center, Planned Resident Activities, Multiple Elevators for Convenience, Storage Units Available, Online Payments Available, Oversized & Double Pane Windows, Take the Train to Hollywood or Downtown, 24 hour Fitness Studio for Cardio & Strength Training, Outdoor BBQ Area, 24 Hour Professional Maintenance, Street Level Retail with Shops & Restaurants, Courtyards with Unique Waterscapes, Walking Distance to Old Town or Lake Avenue, Parking Garage with Controlled Access & Guest Parking, Clubhouse with Gourmet Kitchen for Entertaining, Pet Friendly, Resort Style Pool & Spa, Hollywood Themed Movie Theater
Want more information on this unit?
